definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: In other words, be tactful, but don’t be afraid to give your honest opinion.
sentences.chinese: 換言之，要機智，但是別怕發表你真實的意見。

sentences.english: He wore a dirty white t-shirt and high-water jeans.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着意見很髒的白色襯衫和一件牛仔馬褲。

sentences.english: China, to beat my old drum, is not going to collapse or implode.
sentences.chinese: 請容許我重申我的意見，中國是不會倒塌或內爆的。

sentences.english: Are there any points of resistance to this process of shifting people’s mindsets?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有對改變人們心態進程表示反對的意見呢？

sentences.english: At the next meeting, there was a9)split in the club membership.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的會議裏，俱樂部成員之間出現了意見分歧。

sentences.english: We studied many lawbooks and he knows what I would say.
sentences.chinese: 我們研究了許多法律書籍，所以他知道我的意見。

sentences.english: Opinions on bombing the Serbs cut across party lines.
sentences.chinese: 關於轟炸塞爾維亞的意見違反了黨的路線。

sentences.english: I do not know why I've even come, " he commented to Krasus."
sentences.chinese: “我不知道我爲什麼會來，”他向克拉蘇斯提意見。

sentences.english: Being a stick-in-the-mud, people don't value his opinions.
sentences.chinese: 他是位呆頭呆腦的人，大家不重視他的意見。

sentences.english: This week, he was resoundingly upheld by the Ninth Circuit.
sentences.chinese: 這星期，他的意見轟動性的被第九巡迴法院贊成了。

sentences.english: I even had a suggestion box at one time.
sentences.chinese: 有段時間我甚至設了意見箱。

sentences.english: Great minds think alike, but fools seldom differ.
sentences.chinese: 英雄所見略同，傻瓜很少意見不合。

sentences.english: I wanted to complain about them to the city of San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我決定向舊金山市政府提意見。

sentences.english: Judgment is that the plan is ill-conceived.
sentences.chinese: 我的意見是計劃考慮不周。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, when I have trouble, I always ask her for advice.
sentences.chinese: 跟你說老實話，每當我有麻煩時總向她徵求意見。

definition: to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
